Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Straightshot rushes over to Leo Prime and hops up on his shoulder.=C2=A0 Sh=
e is quick to wisper in his ear what Tucson is up to.

"Sorry, forgot ya di=
dn't know sign language.=C2=A0 Here's the deal, Tucson is not turning on us=
 purposely, he's doing it so he can fool Magmatron into falsely trusting hi=
m.=C2=A0 It's the only way he can get around Magmatron without suspicion.=
=C2=A0 Pass it=C2=A0 along in a silent com to the others.=C2=A0 And play al=
ong with him.=C2=A0 It's the only way we're gonna get outa this in one piec=
e and if you don't then, it won't work.=C2=A0 So pleeeease, try and make th=
is work."

Tucson turns to Leo Prime.=C2=A0 And then turns to Magmatron.

"=
=C2=A0 Hmmm, certainly a proposal worth taking you up on.=C2=A0 All right, =
Rodimus and Leo Prime!=C2=A0 There can be only ONE leader among us!=C2=A0 A=
nd that leader is ME!=C2=A0=C2=A0=C2=A0 You cringe like cowards!=C2=A0 You'=
re afraid to face me in a fight because you know you do not measure up to m=
y caliber!=C2=A0 None of you were trained by Master Yoketron, nor did you t=
ake his training as seriously as I have!=C2=A0 Now, let that mistake be you=
r downfall!"

In the mean time, he sends an internal message to the others,=
 one that Magmatron can not hear.

" If we are to get out of this without s=
uspicion or death, I need you all to play along with me.=C2=A0 I am not rea=
lly turning on you, it's an act that has to be played just right or else it=
 will fail miserably.=C2=A0 I need your FULL cooperation on this and trust =
what I am about to do, even though, it looks difficult to trust.=C2=A0 Rodi=
mus, Leo, I need you to fight me with everything you got, and take heart, i=
f I fall, I understand why, and anything that happens to you, I apologize i=
n advance.=C2=A0=C2=A0 We can do this, Maximals, we can be far better than =
Magmatron.=C2=A0 Now, time to put our plan into action.=C2=A0 Remember... F=
ULL COOPERATION FROM ALL OF YOU OR ELSE THIS DOES NOT WORK."

Tucson roars,=
 as he turns to Leo and the others.

"Well, it's not polite to keep your op=
ponent waiting!"

=C2=A0
Respect those as you wish to be respected.

 From: Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...>=

> <OLD>
>
> WASPINATOR PINGED off the wall, goi=
ng, "Owie..=C2=A0 Not like Optimuzz
> Prime hazn't died...=C2=A0 Truck bot =
diez, comez back, diez again, enough
> make WAZZPINATOR's Head Zpin."=C2=A0=
 Which it did.

<NEW>

There was not much response from NEMESIS PRIME who h=
ad many other
things occupying his attention other then observing WASPINATO=
R. As the
head
banged against the wall and fell into the moist earth, mud a=
nd dirt
fell from the ceiling threatening to cover up the head.

> <OLD>
>
=
> VICE GRIP stayed buried.=C2=A0 Dug as deep as he could, letting his fried=

> systems sizzle dand try and patch themselves.=C2=A0 He would not be able=

> to join the fight for awhile in his BEAST MODE evena s his sytems
> went=
 to lockdown and recharge now, waiting to rejoin if commanded but
> for now=
 exhausted and out of the fight.

<NEW>

As VICE GRIP was recovering from h=
is wounds in the battle the battle
with the MAXIMAL FUZORS and the remainin=
g SHARKTICONS was going fairly
swiftly. It took only a few moments, for the=
m to knock down the rest
of them.

SKYBYTE looked around, and seeing all of=
 his soldiers dead quickly
back pedaled from DINOBOT as he dropped his blad=
e and raced back
towards MAGMATRON!

> OLD>
>
> The bats retreat as they re=
turn to their roosts. Then, something that
> Magmatron said sparks an idea =
in Tucsons directory. What if he could
> actually give Magmatron the grand =
illusion and make it appear that he
> would turn on his comrades while in r=
eality pulling off the most
> strategic illusion of betrayal and winning hi=
s faction a very
> strategic victory? Instead of growling at Magmatron he s=
tops fighting
> and nods in submission.
>
> " You win Magmatron, I can see =
that your skills far outweigh my own.
> But I can also see that in some str=
ange way, we complement each
> other. We are both powerful in our own right=
 and if WE wanted to, we
> could have this planet all to ourselves. "
>
> S=
traightshots jaw drops as do those of Rattrap and Quickstride.
>
> "WHAT?! =
NO ! TUCSON ARE YOU CRAZY!?"
>
> Rattrap squeaks in shock.
>
> " YOU CAN'T =
DO THAT WINGS, YOU'RE BETTER THAN THAT SLAG BALL! "
>
> Quickstride snorts.=

>
> " IF YOU TURN TAIL ON US NOW WE'RE SLAGGED! IS HE OUT OF HIS
> PROCESS=
OR!?"
>
> Tucson turns to face them. He then says something to Straightshot=
 in
> sign language which she nods to.
>
> " Shhh.... Guys... It's okay. He=
's trying something out of the box,
> way out of the box. I hope it works. =
"
>
> Tucson gives her a wink and then turns back to Magmatron, waiting for=

> his response.

<NEW>

MAGMATRON watched the interplay between TUSCON, ST=
RIGHT SHOT and the
other MAXIMALS, especially how STRAIGHTSHOT responded an=
d spoke to the
others.

There was a great laugh from him. =E2=80=9CIf you t=
ruly belong to me now.=E2=80=9D He
said, his mouth curling into a vicious g=
rin, =E2=80=9CThen defeat your one
time comrades.=E2=80=9D He was pointing =
to LEO PRIME and BIG CONVOY who were
also looking at TUSCON with wide optic=
s. They ofcourse had not been
privy to his sign language being on the other=
 side of things and had
not been paying attention to STRAIGHTSHOT=E2=80=99s=
 responses.

They looked at TUSCON as they frowned, =E2=80=9CAnd you spoke =
so ill of
RODIMUS!=E2=80=9D LEO PRIME said.

Meanwhile the confrontation be=
tween RODIMUS PRIME and NEMESIS PRIME
was seemingly at a stalemate as each =
of them looked at each other,
perhaps seeking a shortcoming in the other.

=
=E2=80=9CYou are weak and pathetic Rodimus Prime.=E2=80=9D NEMESIS said in =
a voice
that sounded more like the old MEGATRON than OPTIMUS.

Then with a =
quick motion fired his massive rifle, his black beam
catching RODIMUS full =
in the chest and sent him sailing off the bridge
and onto the ground next t=
o the pit.

RODIMUS=E2=80=99 chest was a black smoking ruin, but his optics=
 were still
bright with sheer determination and will power as he struggled =
to
reach his feet.

NEMESIS smiled, =E2=80=9CI know you, even now you hesit=
ate to strike because
you believe that your beloved friend is still here.=
=E2=80=9D

NEMESIS laughed spreading his arms out as the flames around them=
 grew
hotter and higher!

> <OLD>
>
> "Rodimus COME BACK!!!"said Nightlight=
 while tears started to fell
> "The BRIGDE IS CUMBLING DOWN!!!"
>
> Nightli=
ght made a big esfort and stood up. She barely could stay
> stood up and st=
arted to create a energy ball. She concentrated all
> her energy in that en=
ergy ball, made it specially powerfull, by a
> while she continued creating=
 it till it had a deep red hue.
>
> "RODImus!!!" Screamed the female while =
she shooted that energy ball
> at Nemesis prime.
>
> After that she fell in=
 the ground

<NEW>

NIGHTLIGHT=E2=80=99S energy ball sped through the air a=
nd slammed into
NEMESIS=E2=80=99 back and knocked him forward a step, his b=
ack cracking
slightly from the power of the explosion!

With a frown he tur=
ned around to look at NIGHTLIGHT as she fell to the
ground. =E2=80=9CIt is =
time to end this.=E2=80=9D He said, sounding eerily like
OPTIMUS PRIME of o=
ld once this time. If OPTIMUS PRIME were a homocidal
being.

NEMESIS PRIME =
raised his rifle and aimed it at NIGHTLIGHT . . .

=E2=80=9CNO!!=E2=80=9D R=
ODIMUS screamed out as he leaped across the distance between
himself and NE=
MESIS!

=E2=80=9CRODIMUS!!=E2=80=9D BIG CONVOY yelled, =E2=80=9CWatch out!=
=E2=80=9D

As RODIMUS PRIME hit NEMESIS PRIME, NEMESIS=E2=80=99 blast went =
low, blasting
the far end of the bridge rather than night light.

<<CCCKKRR=
RAAAAAAAAAAKKKKK>>

The bridge shuddered and then splintered into several p=
ieces, and then
NEMESIS PRIME, RODIMUS PRIME and DARK RODIMUS all fell into=
 the pit,
the fires all around them blazing upwards to hit the ceiling
scor=
tching it!

The entire room began to rumble!

(TAG)

- Preston
